description: If you need an Office suite that actually works in real life this is the choice. It's proprietary and all that. The full version is a few bucks but it works. :-)
summary: The only good replacement for MS Office

description: Having used other alternatives to MS Office, the products from SoftMaker seem have the most fidelity when displaying and saving to MS formats. The choice of interface (ribbon or classic) make it feel familiar to use. Not as much functionality as MS Office, which is to be expected, but a decent package for the price.
